Cutscenes.scene: We’ve been having some problems identifying shapes in our products.
Because of this we’ve been losing customers and the factory may need to be closed down.
Apparently, I have been making a lot of mistakes on the job.
We need your help! We’re going to hire you to get this factory back into shape.
This is your work area. When products pass by that don’t belong, select them and put them in the proper bin.
If you do well, you’ll earn more money and the factory will gain a higher star rating.

TransitionScreen.dialogue: It’s your first day. Don’t let us down! We're starting you off with 2D and 3D shapes, and one conveyor belt!

Good work yesterday, 2 days left. Now we'll move you to our advanced factory area. It has 2 conveyor belts, but sadly we couldn't bring the fancy shape monitor. You'll have to recognize these shapes by name only. Good luck!
Now we're going to combine all your learning from the past 2 days. The conveyor belt speeds are off the scale!
It’ll get harder from this point on, we've removed the visuals of the shape because we know you don't need them. You're a pro, good luck today!
We are running at top speed today! You've trained for this day, all your learning from the past 4 days will come in handy. This is our chance to save the factory.

LoseScene.dialogue: Our factory isn’t doing any better.
When you’re ready please try again.

WinScene.dialogue: Our factory is now doing much better, thanks to you!
We’d be honored if you’d rename the factory.
